modName: More Mercenaries and Followers and Allys
summary: Adds more mercenaries to the inns. Followers are going to be based around walking around city interacting. Allys can be found in even the most unexpected places.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]MORE MERCENARIES AND FOLLOWERS AND ALLYS
[/size]Right now there is only 3 mercenaries in Sleeping Giant Inn, and 1 Follower in the same inn. Sleeping Giant Inn is in Riverwood. Winking Skeever now contains 5 Mercenaries and 1 Follower Your second town you dicover depending upon how you play. I will be adding more slowly but surely. Goal is to get atleast 5 Mercenaries in BIG TOWNS, 3 in SMALL TOWNS. and 3 Followers in BIG TOWNS, 1 in SMALL TOWNS. All added characters will be, yes, IMMERSIVE. It is currently BETA. 
 (BE PATIENT PLEASE :D)
[size=5]THIS IS MY FIRST MOD, SO I DONT HAVE ANY PICTURES, CONSTRUCTIVE CRITISIM AND IDEAS ARE MORE THAN WELCOME. THANK YOU. I NEED YOU TO HELP ME MAKE THIS MOD BETTER>REMEMBER IMMERSIVE.[/size]
author: Tcthetitan65
